# Deploy TDERC20
nile deploy TDERC20 10057515165931654559836545801321088512241713 357609582641 1000000000000000000 0 630921626810232507712044280983612479889477627366728615579512531114753636522 630921626810232507712044280983612479889477627366728615579512531114753636522 --network goerli

# Deploy ex1 -> 8
nile deploy ex01 231477375529822902830233063134206100913004476725886887383541694517849719102 --network goerli
nile deploy ex02 231477375529822902830233063134206100913004476725886887383541694517849719102 --network goerli
nile deploy ex03 231477375529822902830233063134206100913004476725886887383541694517849719102 --network goerli
nile deploy ex04 231477375529822902830233063134206100913004476725886887383541694517849719102 --network goerli
nile deploy ex05 231477375529822902830233063134206100913004476725886887383541694517849719102 --network goerli
nile deploy ex06 231477375529822902830233063134206100913004476725886887383541694517849719102 --network goerli
nile deploy ex07 231477375529822902830233063134206100913004476725886887383541694517849719102 --network goerli
nile deploy ex08 231477375529822902830233063134206100913004476725886887383541694517849719102 --network goerli

# Set permissions to mint TDERC20
nile invoke 0x008302f50cf440df1f8355adf9ecaa4604f1b699a05c66e54e876c584a31813e set_teacher_temp 7 1843175048566198375305984977533919712714448611803276049759532789771331671746 190410948553034204914149509884645615847939564669017338034520760403667758048 918013566049669332671621808492083808151196601699570732021582892092054366853 576996100192611808849548042611285767227263280889744789405795006038008688411 689948181221630564313982186244260669685496199951299384287513679514412851192 2871711713215777628526450896308224430616532598199863698658637544049451559574 3043906046300180571538727799155085791801024067961433978692811414539364595217 --network goerli


# Set setup as finished in TDERC20

nile invoke 0x008302f50cf440df1f8355adf9ecaa4604f1b699a05c66e54e876c584a31813e finish_setup --network goerli

# Set random value stores 
ex04
ex05
ex06
nile invoke <address> set_random_values <args> --network goerli
